about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: The story behind the code
about.introText: A seasoned Senior Software Engineer with 7 years of expertise in Microservices, proficient in both backend and frontend development within the Azure + .Net + Angular ecosystem.

about.passionText: Dedicated to continuous learning, innovation, and passionate about knowledge sharing and collaboration. I'm passionate about building solutions that solve real-world problems through microservices architecture, cloud solutions, and modern web technologies.
about.overlayText: Ready to turn your ideas into reality

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with .NET Core, Angular, and Azure. Features include real-time inventory management, payment processing, and analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Healthcare Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive healthcare management system with patient records, appointment scheduling, and telemedicine capabilities.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time analytics dashboard for monitoring business metrics with interactive charts and automated reporting.

experience.type: Full time | USA Customers | Hybrid (W Office 1d, Home 2d)
